message.name: ERR_ENT_INVCASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_FV_STARTDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ENT_INVCASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_FV_ENDDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The end date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ENT_INVCASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_FV_ENDDATE_BEFORE_STARTDATE
message.locale: The end date cannot be before the start date.

message.name: ERR_ENT_INVCASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_FV_ASSESSMENT_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: An Assessment type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ENT_INVCASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_FV_INVESTIGATION_CASE_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: An Investigation Case type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ENT_INVCASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_XRV_OVERLAP_FOUND
message.locale: This Assessment is already assigned to this Investigation Case for this period.
